title: Data Privacy Regulation 2025
summary: All customer data must be encrypted and securely stored.

title: Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Act
summary: Financial institutions must report any suspicious transactions over $10,000.

title: Fair Claims Processing Act
summary: Insurers must acknowledge and act promptly upon communications with respect to claims.

title: Consumer Data Deletion Request
summary: Consumers have the right to request the deletion of their personal data.

title: Unambiguous Contract Terms
summary: Terms and conditions in all contracts must be clear, concise, and easy to understand.
